credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: Bedroom Furniture
provenance: Giovanni Piancastelli (1845-1926); Mr. and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee
medium: Pen and black ink; brush and yellow, brown, blue, and brown watercolor, black chalk on off-white paper
description: Sheet showing a series of related furniture designs. Top row, at left, a bed shown from the front; a bed-table, with a burning torch in front, center; and a chair at right. Bottom row: a low case with two door wings, each with a wreath in front. Base lines.
name: Drawing
